QuestData.Title: Gravewing Crystal
QuestData.Description:
<This large crystal fragment shattered off of the massive construct's body. Flashes of energy crackle inside of it.
The Stonewright in Keeper's Respite would be able to use this crystal to empower a gravewing for you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Gravewing Crystal to the Stonewright in Keeper's Respite.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver Gravewing Crystal to the Stonewright in Keeper's Respite.
